attributes.action: avoid the criminalisation of parents who spank their children lovingly to correct them and help them to become disciplined and responsible members of society.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pressure groups would have the government believe that any form of physical punishment is abuse (which is codswallop). How can a society function when there is no discipline at home? The lack of discipline in our society is clearly evident. We do not want to further damage our society by criminalising those who believe in loving discipline for the good of the child.
